Application Architecture
- User Interface (Streamlit)
- Embeddings Engine (Gemini Embedding 001)
- Vector Database (FAISS)
- LLM Interaction Layer (OpenRouter)
- Document Processing (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
- Chat History + Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)

D-001 Login Login button unresponsive High Open 1. Enter valid data
2. Click Login
3. Nothing happens
D-002 Search Wrong suggestions displayed Medium In Progress 1. Type keyword
2. Suggestions irrelevant

TC-001 US-001 Verify login works 1. Enter username
2. Enter password
3. Click Login User logs in successfully Not Executed
TC-002 US-002 Verify document upload 1. Navigate to Upload
2. Select file
3. Click Upload Document appears in list Not Executed
TC-003 US-003 Verify intelligent suggestions 1. Start typing search
2. Observe suggestions System displays relevant suggestions Not Executed

User Stories
US-001
As a user, I want to log into the application so that I can access my dashboard.
US-002
As an admin, I want to upload documents so that users can search them.
US-003
As a user, I want intelligent search suggestions so that I can find data faster.
US-004
As a QA tester, I want logs so that I can track system errors.
